body:
Hello everyone recently I havent been playing Avicus that much but now I will start back up and I'll also be recording alot on my new channel. I'll be uploading regular videos. Heres my first Avicus Video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lzeXtkzGOK0&list=UUnfsrM1ajG4sGOJpx6ALuHg
I'll be doing videos with DiamondWingman and a friend called Puffhand. Say what I should improve on in the comments. (Im going to make vids more HD, make a better intro and better banner and also a profile picture)

Thank You for Reading

title: Recording Avicus Videos
